5.1.name: wordpress/rss-slider-on-post
5.1.description:
Check official website for live demo http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2012/04/01/rss-slider-on-post-wordpress-plugin/

  • Live Demo
  • More info
  • Comments/Suggestion
  • About author

RSS slider on post is a small WordPress plugin to create the scroller/slider text gallery into the posts and pages, that makes rss integration to your web site very easy.
